name: Freedom (AvatarK0)
description:
Unity had a build error with 10 less min left. But then we found out M&J gave an extra hour! We got so happy!!!

So we tried to fix the build by importing it on to a new project. It worked, but all materials got trashed and some textures as well... :(

I believe this has to do with merge conflicts from Git, that might have corrupted some of the ilumination and materials settings, but who knows for sure.

At least We got to upload it :D

And here is the git repository if anyone wanna try the unbuildable version
https://github.com/Avatark0/MixJam-GameJam/commits/main
